title.value: Proton Pump Inhibitor Drug Value Set

description.value: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) Proton Pump Inhibitor drug class (id: N0000175525). Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)

purpose.value: Proton Pump Inhibitor drug class terminology for PDDI CDS FHIR resources
